name: Shhhh
description:
HEADPHONES / SOUND ON: REQUIRED

Last day before the final test, only 1 topic left. It's a quiet night and I have everything under control...

Fill your Knowledge bar and share your time on the comments!

This game was made for the Trijam #152

Made in ~3h 55m

bugs and glitches may appear.

Made in JS CSS and HTML with no frameworks or library. 

Code by: thetikitakaa

Images by: thetikitakaa

Sound: CC0 license  https://freesound.org/people/Zywx/sounds/188708/
